duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and execute the day-to-day product development process, including overseeing 2024 and 2025 launches.
Research and develop expertise in the beauty category and competitive landscape.
Initiate, write, and present cohesive product briefs internally and externally, and partner with vendors to execute against the product concept.
Responsible for internal communication with cross-functional partners, managing critical project milestones, and ensuring on-time delivery of products.
Partner with key stakeholders to develop strategies for 2025 and bring innovation to product concepts.
Support international expansion activities, evaluate compliance, and work with partners to identify innovation and opportunities for new products.
Build and maintain external vendor relationships, and support training for marketing, sales, retail, and customer support.
Attend meetings, trade shows, labs, factories, and lead presentations to small and large groups, including management and c-suite executives.

education_certification.credential: College degree required or equivalent, with 5+ years relevant work experience in beauty product development.
Passionate about skincare, makeup, and the beauty industry.
Ability to manage multiple projects, work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment, and take ownership and drive results.
Exceptional interpersonal, communication, and presentation skills, with the ability to think both strategically and tactically.
Domestic and international travel is required.
